themeOneFeatureSection.heading: What Makes Shaloz Different?
themeOneFeatureSection.headingThree: Why Small Business Owner's Loves Shaloz
themeOneFeatureSection.headingText: Shaloz is the only platform that allows you earn and cash-out points while you shop for the things you love. With Shaloz, sellers get to spend less time managing their shop and more time on the fun stuff.
themeOneFeatureSection.headingTexttwo: Shaloz is an online marketplace, where people come together to sell, buy and collect unique items. We have millions of one-of-a-kind items, so you can find whatever you need. Manage your store on your mobile device.

featureData.title: Buy
featureData.text: Buy products directly from someone who put their heart and soul into making a difference. Earn points while shopping for the things you love.

featureData.title: Sell
featureData.text: Automated and Powerful tools for every stage of your business. Its simple, transparent, no additional monthly fees, Secure transactions and Automatic deposits.

featureData.title: Secure Payment
featureData.text: Pay through the app while earning points. We use best-in-class technology to protect your transactions and we are always here for you.

serviceData.text: Earn and cash-out points while shopping for the things you love. Our loyalty program puts a smile on every dollar you spend
Independent sellers. Buy directly from someone who put their heart and soul into making something special.
We have millions of one-of-a-kind items, so you can find whatever you need.
Secure shopping. We use best-in-class technology to protect your transactions.

themeOneDiscoverSection.heading: Millions of shoppers can’t wait to see what you have in store
themeOneDiscoverSection.headingText: Spend less time managing your shop and more time on the fun stuff. Build your brand with powerful automated and marketing tools. Shaloz has tools designed for every stage of your business’s growth—no matter how big your ambitions.

discoverData.text: Automated and Powerful tools. Our tools and services make it easy to manage, promote and grow your business from your mobile device.
Simple, transparent, secure, no additional monthly fees, automatic deposits and seller protection.
Enlist your products for free for an unlimited duration.
Go social by sharing your store and products.

themeOneFaqSection.heading: Frequently asked questions
themeOneFaqSection.headingText: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Laborum obcaecati dignissimos quae quo ad iste ipsum officiis deleniti asperiores sit.
themeOneFaqSection.headingTexttwo: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Laborum obcaecati.

faqData.title: Does Shaloz do a verification check on all stores?
faqData.content: Yes. Shaloz first priority is security. We verify all stores on the platform.

faqData.title: Does Shaloz review products?
faqData.content: Yes. We review all products on the platform. When you upload a product, you will see a message on the product saying under-review. When we are done reviewing the product, the message under-review will go away meaning your product has been posted for sale.

faqData.title: How long does product review take?
faqData.content: It usually takes between thirty to fifty seconds from the time of uploading.

faqData.title: How do buyers earn points?
faqData.content: Our loyalty point system is one of the best out there. As you buy, you earn points on every dollar. Every dollar you spend through the Shaloz platform is equivalent to one point.  One point is equivalent to 0.002 cents.

faqData.title: Who pays for Shaloz loyalty program?
faqData.content: Shaloz pays for the loyalty program. Sellers are not affected by our loyalty program.

faqData.title: Does Shaloz issue refunds?
faqData.content: Shaloz happily accepts refunds on all items sold through the platform.

faqData.title: How long does deposit take to post to my account?
faqData.content: It takes two business days to post all earnings to your bank account. Your first deposit takes seven days, the rest take two business days. Deposits may take three to seven business days on holidays.

faqData.title: How does Shaloz promote your product?
faqData.content: Shaloz offers free promotion on all products within the app. We promote your product within and out of the app through our promotion program.

faqDataTwo.title: Are all payments secure through the Shaloz app?
faqDataTwo.content: Shaloz does not share your payment details with sellers. We use best in-class technology to secure your transactions.

faqDataTwo.title: Does Shaloz offer customer support?
faqDataTwo.content: Yes Shaloz does. Our customer support is open 24/7 for any questions or product related issues you might have. You can reach us at support@shaloz.com.

faqDataTwo.title: Can I track my products after shipment?
faqDataTwo.content: Yes you can track all products bought through the Shaloz platform. To track your package, click on the person icon at the bottom of the screen > then click on purchase and review. All packages can be tracked as long as they haven't arrived.

faqDataTwo.title: How can I sell on Shaloz?
faqDataTwo.content: Anyone can sell on Shaloz. It takes one minute to setup your store and start selling. Click on the 'Create your online store button located in the app' to get started.

faqDataTwo.title: Is there any subscription fee for selling?
faqDataTwo.content: We charge no subscription fee. However, Shaloz charges a 5% transaction fee on every successful purchase.

faqDataTwo.title: Does Shaloz charge any fee to enlist products?
faqDataTwo.content: We charge no fee to enlist your products.

faqDataTwo.title: Can sellers issue refunds?
faqDataTwo.content: Yes, All sellers can issue refunds.

faqDataTwo.title: How do you get paid after fulfilling a package?
faqDataTwo.content: After fulfilling a package, we review the transaction and send all payment to your account within two days of the package arriving.
